pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Vitamin C 6% + Alpha Arbutin Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Zingy serum infused with 6% vitamin C reduces dark spots, freckles and imperfections. The brightening formulation evens hyperpigmentation and leaves skin with a natural glow. Use on its own as a nightly treatment or to boost the results of a Skin Republic Face Mask.

Ingredients

INGREDIENTS: Propylene Glycol, Ascorbic Acid 6%, Niacinamide 2%, Alpha-Arbutin, Citrus Limon Peel Oil, Limonene, Citral.

Directions

DIRECTIONS: Cleanse face. Apply a few drops of serum to face and neck. Wait for a minute for serum to absorb. For an intensive treatment apply a Skin Republic Face Mask over serum or follow with a moisturiser.
